CustomField.description: Optional. Enter the API name of a permission. If this field has a value, then the triggers on this object will be bypassed if the running user has the custom permission identified.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional. Enter the API name of a permission. If this field has a value, then the triggers on this object will be bypassed if the running user has the custom permission identified.
CustomField.label: Bypass Permission
